name: Hotel Samara Inn

reviews.text: My wife, 2 daughters and I stayed in Suite B and loved this hotel! We liked it so much, we stayed 2 separate times on our trip to Costa Rica. The proximity is great because it's really close to the beach but away from town (approximately 10 minute walk). The staff were helpful, the rooms were very clean, and the breakfast was very good. My daughters swam in the pool everyday and loved it! There are 2 GREAT sodas between the hotel and the ocean.
reviews.title: Very good place! Perfect location at reasonable price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only negative is that the road in front of the hotel is loud but we NEVER heard it in our rooms because of the layout of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great time

reviews.text: I had wonderful holidays, people who received me there, have always been attentive to my needs, the hotel is comfortable, super clean, it was like being home , a delicious breakfast with a wonderful view over the beach of Samara, which can ask for more for ,sure in my next vacation, i will return, Cintia
reviews.title: anytime again

reviews.text: The staff members were pleasant and responsive, the breakfast was good, the little pool is lovely. Our room was spacious and clean. The hotel was designed with a sense of style, and the balcony and common areas are beautiful. I do wish there were a way to keep the room curtains open without feeling like we were part of a window display.
reviews.title: Nice breakfast, sweet little pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was such a cozy lovely place. Not a luxury hotel but I would sacrifice that for the excellent service and safety.
reviews.title: Felt like home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -I accidentally forgot to lock the safe one morning and left it wide open with money, passports, iPad. When I came back, nothing was stolen. It is a very, very safe hotel.
reviews.title: Clean and cosy hotel

reviews.text: -The staff was sooo nice and accommodating! They treated you like family! I needed some water and the lady at the front desk went to the kitchen and poured me some water herself.
reviews.title: Great hotel, friendly staff

reviews.text: Located a 5 minute walk from the city center, this is a very good hotel for the price. It has a very good pool with different levels, making it suitable also for kids. Our room was basic but had both safe and a/c.
reviews.title: Nice, basic hotel

reviews.text: The bit letdown with this hotel was the surly breakfast staff. They seemed to be bothered by the guests. Breakfast itself was good though.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The best with this hotel is the beautiful pool with the jacuzzi area surrounded by flowers - it´s just lovely. The restaurant is good and the staff is very nice and friendly and make their best to make you feel good.
reviews.title: Clean and modern

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are big and clean with AC.
reviews.title: Friendly small hotel

reviews.text: Extremely clean and modern hotel, but a bit far from things. Breakfast good, staff very friendly. We liked walking short distance to beach by Cangrejal to snorkel at low tide. Quite lovely. Also, Watch out when you are intimate as the bed moves all over the room . Lol.
reviews.title: Quieter than most, great staff, good location in a small village

description: At Samara Inn we are pleased to host you and to provide you with great place to stay in this natural paradise.14 charmining rooms with a/c, cable tv,hot water, private bath and balcony. Everythings there is for your comfortable and pleasant stay
